short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds an ability to hear web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PayCall TTS enable the user to hear the text he reads by clicking on the rounded border text.
PayCall TTS use text to speech engine technology, when the user clicks on text that has rounded border its send the text to the TTS engine and the engine replay with the requested speech of text.
